front.description: Indicates how front the vowel is: "12" for "front" and "1" for "back".

close.description: Indicates how close the vowel is: "12" for "close" and "1" for "open".

round.description: Indicates if the vowel is rounded or unrounded.

x-sampa.description: Text to be translated from X-SAMPA to IPA before using as label.
